page.title: 13RELIGION IN BRANSTON
page.content: Branston church is called All Saints church. In Branston there is a vicar called Mr Stalley and a curate called Mr Dicken. Mr Stalley has been a vicar since 1976 ( 9 years. ) There are 2-3 services every week. There are 4 groups for children. There are 2 Sunday schools, pathfinders and a Friday group. The Sunday schools are for the 4-7 and 7-11 year olds,Pathfinders for the 11-13 year olds and a Friday group for the 13 year olds and onwards that teaches you about being confirmed when you are 14. There is also a Methodist Chapel. The Methodist Minister is called Mr Revett.People in Branston do seem to go to church regularly.They also think that the church does good work in the village.
